page.title: 14SHOPPING
page.content: {"I LOVE SHOPPING IN TEIGNMOUTH."} Slogan of the 1985 sticker campaign to encourage local shopping. Where do we go? A survey of 30 homes. { T'mouth N/Abb Exeter T'bay} {Food} 15 12 2 1 {Clothes} 6 3 16 5 {Hardware/DIY} 11 12 5 2 {Books/toys} 8 5 14 3 (Newton Abbot includes big supermarket and nearby cut-price shopping complex) {WEEKLY FOOD LIST FOR FAMILY OF FOUR {AND PET:} Milk, potatoes(delivered to door), sliced wholemeal bread, tea, salad, coffee, frozen chicken, yoghurt, weetabix, cereal, carrots, crisps, tins of baked beans, catfood, sugar, soup, biscuits, frozen fishfingers, jam, orange juice, apples, a cake, sweets. Pint of milk=23p: loaf of bread=52p.
